00085   EQUIPMENT equipment[] = {
00086 
00087     {
00088 #ifdef USE_EB
00089        EQ_NAME "%02d",          /* equipment name */
00090 #else
00091        EQ_NAME,          /* equipment name */
00092 #endif
00093        {
00094           EQ_EVID, (1<<EQ_EVID),  /* event ID, trigger mask */
00095           "SYSTEM",               /* event buffer */
00096 #ifdef USE_EB
00097           EQ_PERIODIC|EQ_EB,      /* equipment type */
00098 #else
00099           EQ_PERIODIC,            /* equipment type */
00100 #endif
00101           0,                      /* event source */
00102           "MIDAS",                /* format */
00103           TRUE,                   /* enabled */
00104           RO_ALWAYS,              /* when to read this event */
00105           10,                     /* poll time in milliseconds */
00106           0,                      /* stop run after this event limit */
00107           0,                      /* number of sub events */
00108           0,                      /* period for logging history, seconds */
00109           "", "", "",
00110        }
00111        ,
00112        read_wiener_event,         /* readout routine */
00113        NULL,
00114        NULL,
00115        NULL,       /* bank list */
00116     }
00117     ,
00118     {""}
00119   };

00124 /********************************************************************\
00125               Callback routines for system transitions
00126 
00127   These routines are called whenever a system transition like start/
00128   stop of a run occurs. The routines are called on the following
00129   occations:
00130 
00131   frontend_init:  When the frontend program is started. This routine
00132                   should initialize the hardware.
00133 
00134   frontend_exit:  When the frontend program is shut down. Can be used
00135                   to releas any locked resources like memory, commu-
00136                   nications ports etc.
00137 
00138   begin_of_run:   When a new run is started. Clear scalers, open
00139                   rungates, etc.
00140 
00141   end_of_run:     Called on a request to stop a run. Can send
00142                   end-of-run event and close run gates.
00143 
00144   pause_run:      When a run is paused. Should disable trigger events.
00145 
00146   resume_run:     When a run is resumed. Should enable trigger events.
00147 \********************************************************************/
00148

00211 void Replace(std::string&x, const char* replace, const char* with)
00212 {
00213   int i=x.find(replace);
00214   if (i>=0)
00215     x.replace(i, strlen(replace), with);
00216 }

00218 int write_data_float(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hVar, const char* keyname, int num, const std::vector<float>& data)
00219 {
00220    float val[num];
00221    
00222    if ((int)data.size() != num)
00223       printf("key \'%s\', num %d, data.size: %d\n", keyname, num, (int)data.size());
00224 
00225    assert((int)data.size() == num);
00226       
00227    for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00228       val[i] = data[i];
00229 
00230    int status = db_set_value(hDB, hVar, keyname, val, num*sizeof(float), num, TID_FLOAT);
00231    assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
00232    
00233    return SUCCESS;
00234 }
00235 
00236 int write_data_int(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hVar, const char* keyname, int num, const std::vector<int>& data)
00237 {
00238    int val[num];
00239 
00240    if ((int)data.size() != num)
00241       printf("key \'%s\', num %d, data.size: %d\n", keyname, num, (int)data.size());
00242 
00243    assert((int)data.size() == num);
00244       
00245    for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00246       val[i] = data[i];
00247 
00248    int status = db_set_value(hDB, hVar, keyname, val, num*sizeof(int), num, TID_INT);
00249    assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
00250    
00251    return SUCCESS;
00252 }
00253 
00254 int write_data_string(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hVar, const char* keyname, int num, const std::vector<std::string>& data, int length)
00255 {
00256    char val[length*num];
00257 
00258    if ((int)data.size() != num)
00259       printf("key \'%s\', num %d, data.size: %d\n", keyname, num, (int)data.size());
00260 
00261    assert((int)data.size() == num);
00262       
00263    for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00264       strlcpy(val+length*i, data[i].c_str(), length);
00265 
00266    int status = db_set_value(hDB, hVar, keyname, val, num*length, num, TID_STRING);
00267    assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
00268    
00269    return SUCCESS;
00270 }

00272 bool gEnableControl = false;
00273 bool gIgnoreOidNotIncreasing = false;

00275 int set_snmp_float(const char* name, int index, float value)
00276 {
00277    if (!gEnableControl)
00278       return SUCCESS;
00279 
00280    char str[1024];
00281    char s[1024];
00282 
00283    if (index<0)
00284       s[0] = 0;
00285    else
00286       sprintf(s, ".u%d", index);
00287    
00288    sprintf(str, "snmpset -v 2c -M +%s -m +WIENER-CRATE-MIB -c guru %s %s%s F %f", WIENER_MIB_DIR, gWienerDev.c_str(), name, s, value);
00289    
00290    printf("Set wiener float: %s\n", str);
00291    
00292    system(str);
00293 
00294    return SUCCESS;
00295 }
00296 
00297 int set_snmp_int(const char* name, int index, int value)
00298 {
00299    if (!gEnableControl)
00300       return SUCCESS;
00301 
00302    char str[1024];
00303    char s[1024];
00304 
00305    if (index<0)
00306       s[0] = 0;
00307    else
00308       sprintf(s, ".u%d", index);
00309 
00310    sprintf(str, "snmpset -v 2c -M +%s -m +WIENER-CRATE-MIB -c guru %s %s%s i %d", WIENER_MIB_DIR, gWienerDev.c_str(), name, s, value);
00311 
00312    printf("Set wiener integer: %s\n", str);
00313 
00314    system(str);
00315 
00316    return SUCCESS;
00317 }

00328 const char* kGray   = "#A0A0A0";
00329 const char* kRed    = "#FFA0A0";
00330 const char* kGreen  = "#A0FFA0";
00331 const char* kBlue   = "#A0A0FF";
00332 const char* kYellow = "#FFFFA0";
00333 const char* kWhite  = "#FFFFFF";
00334 
00335 class Status
00336 {
00337 public:
00338    std::string fName;
00339    int fNumValues;
00340 
00341    int*  fStatus;
00342    char* fColors;
00343 
00344    Status(const char* name, int numValues)
00345    {
00346       fName      = name;
00347       fNumValues = numValues;
00348       fStatus    = new int[fNumValues];
00349       fColors    = new char[NAME_LENGTH*fNumValues];
00350 
00351       Reset();
00352    }
00353 
00354    ~Status() // dtor
00355    {
00356       delete fColors;
00357       fColors = NULL;
00358       delete fStatus;
00359       fStatus = NULL;
00360       fNumValues = 0;
00361    }
00362 
00363    void Reset()
00364    {
00365       for (int i=0; i<fNumValues; i++) {
00366          fStatus[i] = -1;
00367          strlcpy(fColors+i*NAME_LENGTH, kGray, NAME_LENGTH);
00368       }
00369    }
00370 
00371    void Resize(int newsize)
00372    {
00373       if (newsize <= fNumValues)
00374          return;
00375 
00376       delete fColors;
00377       delete fStatus;
00378 
00379       fNumValues = newsize;
00380       fStatus    = new int[fNumValues];
00381       fColors    = new char[NAME_LENGTH*fNumValues];
00382 
00383       Reset();
00384    }
00385 
00386    void Add(int index, int status, const char* colour)
00387    {
00388       assert(index>=0);
00389       assert(index<fNumValues);
00390 
00391       if (status > fStatus[index]) {
00392          fStatus[index] = status;
00393          strlcpy(fColors+index*NAME_LENGTH, colour, NAME_LENGTH);
00394       }
00395    }
00396 
00397    void Add(int index, const Status& s, int sindex)
00398    {
00399       assert(index>=0);
00400       assert(index<fNumValues);
00401 
00402       assert(sindex>=0);
00403       assert(sindex<s.fNumValues);
00404 
00405       if (s.fStatus[sindex] > fStatus[index]) {
00406          fStatus[index] = s.fStatus[sindex];
00407          strlcpy(fColors+index*NAME_LENGTH, s.fColors+sindex*NAME_LENGTH, NAME_LENGTH);
00408       }
00409    }
00410 
00411    void Write()
00412    {
00413       //printf("writing \'%s\' value %d, size %d\n", (fName).c_str(), fStatus[0], fNumValues);
00414 
00415       int status = db_set_value(hDB, hStatus, (fName).c_str(), fStatus, fNumValues*sizeof(int), fNumValues, TID_INT);
00416       assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
00417 
00418       status = db_set_value(hDB, hStatus, (fName + "Color").c_str(), fColors, fNumValues*NAME_LENGTH, fNumValues, TID_STRING);
00419       assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
00420    }
00421 };

00465 struct Readback
00466 {
00467 public:
00468    int numOutputs;
00469    int sysMainSwitch;
00470 
00471    std::vector<std::string> names;
00472    std::vector<int>   indices;
00473    std::vector<int>   switches;
00474    std::vector<int>   status;
00475    std::vector<std::string> statusString;
00476    std::vector<float> demandV;
00477    std::vector<float> demandI;
00478    std::vector<float> senseV;
00479    std::vector<float> currents;
00480    std::vector<float> rampUpRates;
00481    std::vector<float> rampDownRates;
00482    std::vector<std::string> groupsSwitchNames;
00483 
00484    std::vector<time_t> sparkTime;
00485    std::vector<int>    sparkCount;
00486 
00487    std::vector<int>    sensorTemperature;
00488    std::vector<int>    fanSpeed;
00489 
00490    Readback()
00491    {
00492       numOutputs = 0;
00493       sysMainSwitch = -1;
00494    }
00495 
00496    void Clear()
00497    {
00498       names.clear();
00499       indices.clear();
00500       switches.clear();
00501       status.clear();
00502       statusString.clear();
00503       demandV.clear();
00504       demandI.clear();
00505       senseV.clear();
00506       currents.clear();
00507       rampUpRates.clear();
00508       rampDownRates.clear();
00509       groupsSwitchNames.clear();
00510       sensorTemperature.clear();
00511       fanSpeed.clear();
00512    }
00513 };

00529 static void update_settings()
00530 {
00531   char str[1024];
00532 
00533   cm_msg(MINFO, frontend_name, "Updating settings!");
00534 
00535   gMainStatus.Reset();
00536   gMainStatus.Add(0, 1000, kBlue);
00537   gMainStatus.Write();
00538 
00539   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/ReadPeriod", eq_name);
00540 
00541   gReadPeriod = odbReadInt(str, 0, 10);
00542 
00543   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/IgnoreOidNotIncreasing", eq_name);
00544 
00545   gIgnoreOidNotIncreasing = odbReadInt(str, 0, 0);
00546 
00547   //if (gIgnoreOidNotIncreasing)
00548   //cm_msg(MINFO, frontend_name, "Ignoring the \'OID not increasing\' error");
00549 
00550   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/EnableControl", eq_name);
00551 
00552   gEnableControl = odbReadInt(str, 0, 0);
00553 
00554   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/EnableSparkMode", eq_name);
00555 
00556   set.enableSparkMode = odbReadInt(str, 0, 0);
00557 
00558   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/SparkShutdownTime", eq_name);
00559 
00560   set.sparkShutdownTime = odbReadInt(str, 0, 5);
00561 
00562   // turn the mainframe on or off
00563 
00564   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/mainSwitch", eq_name);
00565 
00566   set.mainSwitch = odbReadInt(str, 0, 0);
00567 
00568   gMainSwitchStatus.Add(0, 1000, kBlue);
00569   gMainSwitchStatus.Write();
00570 
00571   set_snmp_int("sysMainSwitch.0", -1, set.mainSwitch);
00572 
00573   if (set.mainSwitch != rdb.sysMainSwitch) {
00574      printf("mainswitch %d %d\n", set.mainSwitch, rdb.sysMainSwitch);
00575      ss_sleep(30000);
00576   }
00577 
00578   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputEnable", eq_name);
00579 
00580   set.outputEnable = odbReadInt(str, 0, 0);
00581 
00582   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/numOutputs", eq_name);
00583 
00584   set.numOutputs = odbReadInt(str, 0, 0);
00585 
00586   if (rdb.numOutputs > set.numOutputs) {
00587      cm_msg(MINFO, frontend_name, "Number of output channels changed from %d to %d", set.numOutputs, rdb.numOutputs);
00588      set.numOutputs = rdb.numOutputs;
00589      odbWriteInt(str, 0, set.numOutputs);
00590   }
00591 
00592   gOutputStatus.Resize(set.numOutputs);
00593   gSwitchStatus.Resize(set.numOutputs);
00594   gStatusStatus.Resize(set.numOutputs);
00595   gDemandStatus.Resize(set.numOutputs);
00596   gMeasuredStatus.Resize(set.numOutputs);
00597 
00598   int num = rdb.numOutputs;
00599 
00600   // set the ramping rates
00601 
00602   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/rampRate", eq_name);
00603 
00604   set.rampRate = odbReadFloat(str, 0, 0);
00605 
00606   if (set.rampRate > 0) {
00607      assert(!rdb.rampUpRates.empty());
00608      assert(!rdb.rampDownRates.empty());
00609 
00610      for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00611         {
00612            if (fabs(set.rampRate - rdb.rampUpRates[i]) > 0.1)
00613               set_snmp_float("outputVoltageRiseRate", rdb.indices[i], set.rampRate);
00614            
00615         if (fabs(set.rampRate - rdb.rampDownRates[i]) > 0.1)
00616            set_snmp_float("outputVoltageFallRate", rdb.indices[i], set.rampRate);
00617         }
00618   }
00619      
00620   // set enableKill
00621 
00622   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/enableKill", eq_name);
00623 
00624   set.enableKill = odbReadInt(str, 0, 1);
00625 
00626   if (set.enableKill >= 0)
00627      {
00628         int value = 0;
00629         if (set.enableKill == 0)
00630            value = 4;
00631         else if (set.enableKill == 1)
00632            value = 5;
00633 
00634         if (value)
00635            {
00636               if (rdb.groupsSwitchNames.size() > 0)
00637                  {
00638                     for (unsigned i=0; i<rdb.groupsSwitchNames.size(); i++)
00639                        set_snmp_int(rdb.groupsSwitchNames[i].c_str(), -1, value);
00640                  }
00641            }
00642      }
00643 
00644   // set output voltage limits
00645 
00646   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/maxVoltage", eq_name);
00647 
00648   odbResizeArray(str, TID_FLOAT, set.numOutputs);
00649 
00650   set.maxVoltage.resize(set.numOutputs);
00651 
00652   for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00653      {
00654         set.maxVoltage[i] = odbReadFloat(str, i);
00655      }
00656 
00657   // set resistance
00658 
00659   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/resistance", eq_name);
00660 
00661   odbResizeArray(str, TID_FLOAT, set.numOutputs);
00662 
00663   set.resistance.resize(set.numOutputs);
00664 
00665   for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00666      {
00667         set.resistance[i] = odbReadFloat(str, i);
00668      }
00669 
00670   // set output current limits
00671 
00672   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputCurrent", eq_name);
00673 
00674   odbResizeArray(str, TID_FLOAT, set.numOutputs);
00675 
00676   for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00677      {
00678         float outputCurrent = odbReadFloat(str, i);
00679 
00680         if (outputCurrent != rdb.demandI[i])
00681            {
00682               set_snmp_float("outputCurrent", rdb.indices[i], outputCurrent);
00683            }
00684      }
00685 
00686   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputVoltage", eq_name);
00687 
00688   odbResizeArray(str, TID_FLOAT, set.numOutputs);
00689 
00690   set.odbDemand.resize(set.numOutputs);
00691   set.demand.resize(set.numOutputs);
00692 
00693   for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00694      {
00695         set.odbDemand[i] = odbReadFloat(str, i);
00696         set.demand[i] = set.odbDemand[i];
00697 
00698         if (set.resistance[i])
00699            {
00700               double current = rdb.currents[i];
00701               if (current < 0)
00702                  current = 0;
00703               double vcorr = set.resistance[i] * current;
00704               printf("chan %d, voltage %f V, current %f A, resistance %f Ohm, correction %f V\n", i, set.demand[i], current, set.resistance[i], vcorr);
00705               set.demand[i] += vcorr;
00706            }
00707 
00708         if (set.maxVoltage[i])
00709            if (set.demand[i] > set.maxVoltage[i])
00710               set.demand[i] = set.maxVoltage[i];
00711 
00712         if (rdb.sysMainSwitch > 0) {
00713            if (fabs(set.demand[i] - rdb.demandV[i]) > 0.001)
00714               {
00715                  printf("mainswitch %d %d, num chan %d %d\n", set.mainSwitch, rdb.sysMainSwitch, set.numOutputs, rdb.numOutputs);
00716                  set_snmp_float("outputVoltage", rdb.indices[i], set.demand[i]);
00717                  gDemandStatus.Add(i, 1000, kBlue);
00718               }
00719         }
00720      }
00721 
00722   gDemandStatus.Write();
00723 
00724   // turn channels on and off
00725 
00726   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputSwitch", eq_name);
00727 
00728   odbResizeArray(str, TID_INT, set.numOutputs);
00729 
00730   set.outputSwitch.resize(set.numOutputs);
00731 
00732   for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
00733      {
00734         set.outputSwitch[i] = odbReadInt(str, i);
00735 
00736         if (!set.outputEnable)
00737            set.outputSwitch[i] = 0;
00738 
00739         if (set.outputSwitch[i] != rdb.switches[i])
00740            {
00741               if (set.outputSwitch[i]==1) {
00742 
00743                  // before channel turn-on, clear error status
00744                  set_snmp_int("outputSwitch", rdb.indices[i], 10);
00745 
00746                  if (set.enableSparkMode) {
00747                     // in spark counting mode, set supervisor behaviour to 0 (no trip)
00748                     set_snmp_int("outputSupervisionBehavior", rdb.indices[i], 0);
00749 
00750                     // in spark counting mode, set trip time to 1
00751                     set_snmp_int("outputTripTimeMaxCurrent", rdb.indices[i], 1);
00752 
00753                     // clear spark count?
00754                     rdb.sparkCount[i] = 0;
00755                     rdb.sparkTime[i]  = 0;
00756                  }
00757               }
00758 
00759               set_snmp_int("outputSwitch", rdb.indices[i], set.outputSwitch[i]);
00760 
00761               gSwitchStatus.Add(i, 1000, kBlue);
00762            }
00763      }
00764 
00765   gSwitchStatus.Write();
00766 
00767   gNextRead = time(NULL);
00768   gFastRead = 10;
00769 }
00770 
00771 static void open_hotlink(HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hSet)
00772 {
00773   static bool once = false;
00774   if (once)
00775     return;
00776   once = true;
00777 
00778   update_settings();
00779 
00780   int status = db_open_record(hDB, hSet, NULL, 0, MODE_READ, handle_hotlink, NULL);
00781   assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
00782 }
00783 
00784 /*-- Frontend Init -------------------------------------------------*/
00785 
00786 INT frontend_init()
00787 {
00788   setbuf(stdout,NULL);
00789   setbuf(stderr,NULL);
00790 
00791 #ifdef USE_EB
00792   if (frontend_index < 1)
00793     {
00794       cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "frontend_init(): Frontend index %d is not valid, please start with \'-i 1\'", frontend_index);
00795       return !SUCCESS;
00796     }
00797 
00798   sprintf(eq_name, "%s%02d", EQ_NAME, frontend_index);
00799 #else
00800   sprintf(eq_name, "%s", EQ_NAME);
00801 #endif
00802 
00803   char str[1024];
00804   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/Hostname", eq_name);
00805 
00806   gWienerDev = odbReadString(str, 0, "", 200);
00807 
00808   if (gWienerDev.length() < 2)
00809     {
00810       cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "frontend_init(): Hostname is blank, please set \'%s\'", str);
00811       return !SUCCESS;
00812     }
00813 
00814   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/SnmpwalkCommand", eq_name);
00815 
00816   gSnmpwalkCommand = odbReadString(str, 0, "", 200);
00817 
00818   sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/DelayMainStatus", eq_name);
00819 
00820   gMainStatusDelay = odbReadInt(str, 0, 60);
00821 
00822   gDelayedMainStatus.Reset();
00823   gDelayedMainStatus.Add(0, 1000, kBlue);
00824 
00825   set_equipment_status(eq_name, "Init Ok", "#00FF00");
00826 
00827   return SUCCESS;
00828 }
00829 
00830 int read_wiener_event(char *pevent, INT off)
00831 {
00832   time_t now;
00833   time(&now);
00834 
00835   if (hVar==0)
00836     {
00837       char str[1024];
00838       sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Variables", eq_name);
00839 
00840       int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hVar);
00841       if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
00842         {
00843           status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00844           if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
00845             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hVar);
00846         }
00847 
00848       if (status != SUCCESS)
00849         {
00850           cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
00851           exit(1);
00852         }
00853     }
00854 
00855   if (hSet==0)
00856     {
00857       char str[1024];
00858       sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings", eq_name);
00859 
00860       int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hSet);
00861       if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
00862         {
00863           status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00864           if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
00865             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hSet);
00866         }
00867 
00868       if (status != SUCCESS)
00869         {
00870           cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
00871           exit(1);
00872         }
00873     }
00874 
00875   if (hRdb==0)
00876     {
00877       char str[1024];
00878       sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Readback", eq_name);
00879 
00880       int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hRdb);
00881       if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
00882         {
00883           status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00884           if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
00885             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hRdb);
00886         }
00887 
00888       if (status != SUCCESS)
00889         {
00890           cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
00891           exit(1);
00892         }
00893     }
00894 
00895   if (hStatus==0)
00896     {
00897       char str[1024];
00898       sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Status", eq_name);
00899 
00900       int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hStatus);
00901       if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
00902         {
00903           status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00904           if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
00905             status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hStatus);
00906         }
00907 
00908       if (status != SUCCESS)
00909         {
00910           cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
00911           exit(1);
00912         }
00913     }
00914 
00915   if (now < gNextRead)
00916      return 0;
00917 
00918   if (gFastRead > 0)
00919      {
00920         gFastRead--;
00921         gNextRead = now + 1;
00922      }
00923   else
00924      gNextRead += gReadPeriod; // ODB settings read period
00925 
00926   if (gNextRead < now)
00927      gNextRead = now + 10; // ODB settings read period
00928 
00929   if (gNextUpdate) {
00930      gNextUpdate = 0;
00931      update_settings();
00932      return 0;
00933   }
00934 
00935   //
00936   // Note: please copy WIENER-CRATE-MIB.txt to /usr/share/snmp/mibs/
00937   //
00938   // Control commands:
00939   //
00940   // snmpset -v 2c -m +WIENER-CRATE-MIB -c guru daqtmp1 sysMainSwitch.0 i 1
00941   // snmpset -v 2c -m +WIENER-CRATE-MIB -c guru daqtmp1 outputSwitch.u100 i 1
00942   // snmpset -v 2c -m +WIENER-CRATE-MIB -c guru daqtmp1 outputVoltage.u100 F 10
00943   //
00944 
00945   bool read_ok = false;
00946 
00947   char str[1024];
00948 
00949   if (gSnmpwalkCommand.length() > 2)
00950      sprintf(str, "%s 2>&1", gSnmpwalkCommand.c_str());
00951   else
00952      sprintf(str, "snmpwalk -v 2c -M +%s -m +WIENER-CRATE-MIB -c guru %s crate 2>&1", WIENER_MIB_DIR, gWienerDev.c_str());
00953 
00954   printf("Read wiener event: %s\n", str);
00955 
00956   rdb.Clear();
00957 
00958   FILE *fp = popen(str, "r");
00959   if (fp == NULL)
00960     {
00961       ss_sleep(200);
00962       return 0;
00963     }
00964 
00965   while (1)
00966     {
00967       char *s = fgets(str, sizeof(str), fp);
00968       if (!s)
00969         break;
00970 
00971       //printf("wiener: %s\n", s);
00972 
00973       char name[1024];
00974 
00975       s = strstr(str, "No Response from");
00976       if (s)
00977         {
00978           printf("No response from : %s", str);
00979           if (gCommError == 0) {
00980              cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: No response from \'%s\': %s", gWienerDev.c_str(), str);
00981              gCommError = 1;
00982           }
00983           continue;
00984         }
00985 
00986       s = strstr(str, "Error: OID not increasing");
00987       if (s)
00988         {
00989            if (gIgnoreOidNotIncreasing) {
00990               pclose(fp);
00991               return 0;
00992            }
00993           gCommError = 1;
00994           printf("Strange SNMP error : %s", str);
00995           cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Strange SNMP error from \'%s\': %s", gWienerDev.c_str(), str);
00996           pclose(fp);
00997           return 0;
00998         }
00999 
01000       s = strstr(str, "WIENER-CRATE-MIB::");
01001       if (s == NULL)
01002         {
01003           gCommError = 1;
01004           printf("unknown response (no WIENER-CRATE-MIB::) : %s", str);
01005           continue;
01006         }
01007 
01008       strcpy(name, s+18);
01009 
01010       char* q = strstr(name, " = ");
01011       if (q == NULL)
01012         {
01013           printf("unknown response (no \'=\'): %s", str);
01014           continue;
01015         }
01016 
01017       *q = 0;
01018 
01019       //printf("name [%s]\n", name);
01020 
01021       if (1)
01022         {
01023           std::string x = name;
01024           Replace(x, "outputMeasurement", "oMeas");
01025           Replace(x, "outputSupervision", "oSup");
01026           Replace(x, "outputConfig", "oConf");
01027           Replace(x, "TerminalVoltage", "TermV");
01028           Replace(x, "SenseVoltage", "SenseV");
01029           Replace(x, "sensorTemperature", "sensorT");
01030           Replace(x, "sensorWarningThreshold", "sensorWarnThr");
01031           Replace(x, "sensorFailureThreshold", "sensorFailThr");
01032           Replace(x, "psAuxiliary", "psAux");
01033           strcpy(name, x.c_str());
01034         }
01035 
01036       if (strlen(name) >= NAME_LENGTH-1)
01037         {
01038           std::string x = name;
01039           int i;
01040 
01041           i=x.find("Threshold");
01042           if (i>=0)
01043             x.replace(i, 9, "Thr");
01044 
01045           i=x.find("outputConfig");
01046           if (i>=0)
01047             x.replace(i, strlen("outputConfig"), "oConf");
01048 
01049           i=x.find("outputSupervision");
01050           if (i>=0)
01051             x.replace(i, strlen("outputSupervision"), "oSup");
01052 
01053           i=x.find("outputMeasurement");
01054           if (i>=0)
01055             x.replace(i, strlen("outputMeasurement"), "oMeas");
01056 
01057           i=x.find("Terminal");
01058           if (i>=0)
01059             x.replace(i, strlen("Terminal"), "Term");
01060 
01061           //printf("transform %s -> %s\n", name, x.c_str());
01062 
01063           strcpy(name, x.c_str());
01064         }
01065 
01066       if (strlen(name) >= NAME_LENGTH-1)
01067         {
01068           cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Variable name \'%s\' is too long %d, limit %d", name, strlen(name), NAME_LENGTH-1);
01069           exit(1);
01070         }
01071 
01072       if ((s = strstr(str, "No more variables")) != NULL)
01073         {
01074           continue;
01075         }
01076       else if ((s = strstr(str, "INTEGER:")) != NULL)
01077         {
01078           s += 8;
01079           while (*s != 0)
01080             {
01081               if (isdigit(*s))
01082                 break;
01083               if (*s == '-')
01084                 break;
01085               if (*s == '+')
01086                 break;
01087               s++;
01088             }
01089 
01090           int val = atoi(s);
01091           //printf("%s = int value %d from %s", name, val, str);
01092           db_set_value(hDB, hRdb, name, &val, sizeof(val), 1, TID_INT);
01093 
01094           if (strstr(name, "Meas"))
01095             {
01096               if (strstr(name, "Temp"))
01097                 {
01098 #if 0
01099                   char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01100                   assert(ss);
01101                   int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01102                   assert(chan>=0 && chan<MAX_CHAN);
01103                   //printf("chan %d temperature %d\n", chan, val);
01104                   temperature[chan] = val;
01105 #endif
01106                 }
01107             }
01108           else if (strstr(name, "sysMainSwitch"))
01109             {
01110                char *ss = strstr(name, ".0");
01111                assert(ss);
01112                int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01113                rdb.sysMainSwitch = val;
01114                read_ok = true;
01115                gCommError = 0;
01116             }
01117           else if (strstr(name, "outputSwitch"))
01118             {
01119                char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01120                assert(ss);
01121                int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01122                rdb.switches.push_back(val);
01123             }
01124           else if (strstr(name, "groupsSwitch"))
01125             {
01126                //printf("group name [%s]\n", name);
01127                rdb.groupsSwitchNames.push_back(name);
01128             }
01129           else if (strstr(name, "outputNumber"))
01130             {
01131                // nothing
01132             }
01133           else if (strstr(name, "sensorT"))
01134             {
01135                char *ss = strstr(name, ".temp");
01136                assert(ss);
01137                int chan = atoi(ss+5);
01138                rdb.sensorTemperature.push_back(val);
01139                //printf("name [%s] chan %d, val %d\n", name, chan, val);
01140             }
01141           else if (strstr(name, "fanSpeed"))
01142             {
01143                char *ss = strstr(name, ".");
01144                assert(ss);
01145                int chan = atoi(ss+1);
01146                rdb.fanSpeed.push_back(val);
01147                //printf("name [%s] chan %d, val %d\n", name, chan, val);
01148             }
01149         }
01150       else if ((s = strstr(str, "Float:")) != NULL)
01151         {
01152           float val = atof(s + 6);
01153           //printf("%s = float value %f\n", name, val);
01154           db_set_value(hDB, hRdb, name, &val, sizeof(val), 1, TID_FLOAT);
01155 
01156           if (strstr(name, "oMeasCurrent"))
01157              {
01158                 char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01159                 assert(ss);
01160                 int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01161                 //printf("chan %d current %f\n", chan, val);
01162                 rdb.currents.push_back(val);
01163              }
01164           else if (strstr(name, "psAux"))
01165             {
01166                // ignore
01167             }
01168           else if (strstr(name, "Meas"))
01169             {
01170               if (strstr(name, "SenseV"))
01171                 {
01172                   char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01173                   assert(ss);
01174                   int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01175                   rdb.senseV.push_back(val);
01176                 }
01177               else if (strstr(name, "Current"))
01178                 {
01179                   char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01180                   assert(ss);
01181                   int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01182                   //printf("chan %d current %f\n", chan, val);
01183                   rdb.currents.push_back(val);
01184                 }
01185             }
01186           else if (strstr(name, "outputVoltage.u"))
01187              {
01188                 char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01189                 assert(ss);
01190                 int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01191                 //printf("chan %d current %f\n", chan, val);
01192                 rdb.demandV.push_back(val);
01193              }
01194           else if (strstr(name, "outputVoltageRiseRate.u"))
01195              {
01196                 char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01197                 assert(ss);
01198                 int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01199                 //printf("chan %d current %f\n", chan, val);
01200                 rdb.rampUpRates.push_back(val);
01201              }
01202           else if (strstr(name, "outputVoltageFallRate.u"))
01203              {
01204                 char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01205                 assert(ss);
01206                 int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01207                 //printf("chan %d current %f\n", chan, val);
01208                 rdb.rampDownRates.push_back(val);
01209              }
01210           else if (strstr(name, "outputCurrent.u"))
01211              {
01212                 char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01213                 assert(ss);
01214                 int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01215                 //printf("chan %d current %f\n", chan, val);
01216                 rdb.demandI.push_back(val);
01217                 rdb.indices.push_back(chan);
01218              }
01219         }
01220       else if ((s = strstr(str, "BITS:")) != NULL)
01221         {
01222           uint32_t val = 0;
01223           char* ss = s+5;
01224 
01225           //printf("bits %s\n", ss);
01226 
01227           int ishift = 0;
01228 
01229           while (*ss)
01230             {
01231               while (isspace(*ss))
01232                 ss++;
01233 
01234               int xval = 0;
01235 
01236               if (isdigit(*ss)) {
01237                  xval = (*ss - '0');
01238               } else if ((toupper(*ss) >= 'A') && (toupper(*ss) <= 'F')) {
01239                  xval = 10 + (toupper(*ss) - 'A');
01240               } else {
01241                  break;
01242               }
01243 
01244               // bits go in reverse order
01245 
01246               int ival = 0;
01247 
01248               if (xval&1)
01249                  ival |= 8;
01250 
01251               if (xval&2)
01252                  ival |= 4;
01253 
01254               if (xval&4)
01255                  ival |= 2;
01256 
01257               if (xval&8)
01258                  ival |= 1;
01259 
01260               val |= (ival<<ishift);
01261 
01262               ishift += 4;
01263 
01264               ss++;
01265             }
01266 
01267           if (1)
01268              {
01269                 char *xss;
01270                 xss = strchr(ss, '\n');
01271                 if (xss)
01272                    *xss = 0;
01273                 xss = strchr(ss, '\r');
01274                 if (xss)
01275                    *xss = 0;
01276              }
01277 
01278           char* text = ss;
01279 
01280           //printf("%s = bit value 0x%08x from [%s], text [%s]\n", name, val, str, text);
01281 
01282           db_set_value(hDB, hRdb, name, &val, sizeof(val), 1, TID_DWORD);
01283 
01284           if (strstr(name, "outputStatus"))
01285             {
01286                char *ss = strstr(name, ".u");
01287                assert(ss);
01288                int chan = atoi(ss+2);
01289                rdb.status.push_back(val);
01290                rdb.statusString.push_back(text);
01291             }
01292         }
01293       else if ((s = strstr(str, "STRING:")) != NULL)
01294         {
01295           char *ss =  (s + 8);
01296           while (isspace(*ss))
01297             ss++;
01298           if (ss[strlen(ss)-1]=='\n')
01299             ss[strlen(ss)-1]=0;
01300 
01301           //printf("%s = string value [%s]\n", name, ss);
01302           db_set_value(hDB, hRdb, name, ss, strlen(ss)+1, 1, TID_STRING);
01303 
01304           if (strstr(name,"outputName"))
01305              {
01306                 rdb.names.push_back(ss);
01307              }
01308         }
01309       else if ((s = strstr(str, "IpAddress:")) != NULL)
01310         {
01311           char *ss =  (s + 10);
01312           while (isspace(*ss))
01313             ss++;
01314           if (ss[strlen(ss)-1]=='\n')
01315             ss[strlen(ss)-1]=0;
01316 
01317           //printf("%s = IpAddress value [%s]\n", name, ss);
01318           db_set_value(hDB, hRdb, name, ss, strlen(ss)+1, 1, TID_STRING);
01319         }
01320       else if ((s = strstr(str, " = \"\"")) != NULL)
01321          {
01322             db_set_value(hDB, hRdb, name, "", 1, 1, TID_STRING);
01323          }
01324       else
01325          {
01326             printf("%s = unknown data type: %s", name, str);
01327          }
01328     }
01329 
01330   pclose(fp);
01331 
01332   if (read_ok && gCommError==0)
01333      set_equipment_status(eq_name, "Ok", "#00FF00");
01334   else
01335      set_equipment_status(eq_name, "Communication problem", "red");
01336 
01337   //printf("sizes: %d %d %d %d %d %d\n", names.size(), switches.size(), status.size(), demandV.size(), senseV.size(), currents.size());
01338 
01339   int num = rdb.names.size();
01340 
01341   if (num == 0)
01342      {
01343         if (rdb.numOutputs == 0) {
01344            open_hotlink(hDB, hSet);
01345            return 0;
01346         }
01347 
01348         num = rdb.numOutputs;
01349 
01350         for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
01351            {
01352               rdb.switches.push_back(0);
01353               rdb.status.push_back(0);
01354               rdb.statusString.push_back("");
01355               rdb.demandV.push_back(0);
01356               rdb.senseV.push_back(0);
01357               rdb.currents.push_back(0);
01358            }
01359      }
01360 
01361   rdb.numOutputs = num;
01362 
01363   if (hNames==0)
01364      {
01365         bool doWriteNames = false;
01366         char str[1024];
01367         sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/Names", eq_name);
01368         
01369         int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hNames);
01370         if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
01371            {
01372               status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_STRING);
01373               if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01374                  status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hNames);
01375               doWriteNames = true;
01376            }
01377         
01378         if (status != SUCCESS)
01379            {
01380               cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
01381               exit(1);
01382            }
01383 
01384         if (doWriteNames)
01385            {
01386               for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
01387                  {
01388                     status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hNames, rdb.names[i].c_str(), NAME_LENGTH, i, TID_STRING);
01389                     assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
01390                  }
01391            }
01392 
01393         if (1)
01394            {
01395               HNDLE hKey;
01396               sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Status/HwNames", eq_name);
01397         
01398               int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01399               if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
01400                  {
01401                     status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_STRING);
01402                     if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01403                        status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hKey);
01404                  }
01405 
01406               for (int i=0; i<num; i++)
01407                  {
01408                     status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hKey, rdb.names[i].c_str(), NAME_LENGTH, i, TID_STRING);
01409                     assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
01410                  }
01411            }
01412      }
01413 
01414   if (rdb.sensorTemperature.size()>0 && hTemperatureNames==0)
01415      {
01416         bool doWriteNames = false;
01417         char str[1024];
01418         sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/Names sensorTemperature", eq_name);
01419         
01420         int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hTemperatureNames);
01421         if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
01422            {
01423               status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_STRING);
01424               if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01425                  status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hTemperatureNames);
01426               doWriteNames = true;
01427            }
01428         
01429         if (status != SUCCESS)
01430            {
01431               cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
01432               exit(1);
01433            }
01434 
01435         if (doWriteNames)
01436            {
01437               for (int i=0; i<rdb.sensorTemperature.size(); i++)
01438                  {
01439                     char xname[256];
01440                     sprintf(xname, "temp%d", i+1);
01441                     status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hTemperatureNames, xname, NAME_LENGTH, i, TID_STRING);
01442                     assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
01443                  }
01444            }
01445      }
01446 
01447   if (rdb.fanSpeed.size()>0 && hFanSpeedNames==0)
01448      {
01449         bool doWriteNames = false;
01450         char str[1024];
01451         sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/Names fanSpeed", eq_name);
01452         
01453         int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hFanSpeedNames);
01454         if (status == DB_NO_KEY)
01455            {
01456               status = db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_STRING);
01457               if (status == DB_SUCCESS)
01458                  status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hFanSpeedNames);
01459               doWriteNames = true;
01460            }
01461         
01462         if (status != SUCCESS)
01463            {
01464               cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "read_wiener_event: Cannot find or create %s, status %d, exiting", str, status);
01465               exit(1);
01466            }
01467 
01468         if (doWriteNames)
01469            {
01470               for (int i=0; i<rdb.fanSpeed.size(); i++)
01471                  {
01472                     char xname[256];
01473                     sprintf(xname, "Fan %d", i+1);
01474                     status = db_set_data_index(hDB, hFanSpeedNames, xname, NAME_LENGTH, i, TID_STRING);
01475                     assert(status == DB_SUCCESS);
01476                  }
01477            }
01478      }
01479 
01480   if (1)
01481      {
01482         HNDLE hkey;
01483         char str[1024];
01484         sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputSwitch", eq_name);
01485         
01486         int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkey);
01487 
01488         if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
01489            write_data_int(hDB, hSet, "outputSwitch",  num, rdb.switches);
01490      }
01491 
01492   
01493   if (1)
01494      {
01495         HNDLE hkey;
01496         char str[1024];
01497         sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputVoltage", eq_name);
01498         
01499         int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkey);
01500 
01501         if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
01502            write_data_float(hDB, hSet, "outputVoltage",  num, rdb.demandV);
01503      }
01504 
01505   if (1)
01506      {
01507         HNDLE hkey;
01508         char str[1024];
01509         sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s/Settings/outputCurrent", eq_name);
01510         
01511         int status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &hkey);
01512 
01513         if (status != DB_SUCCESS)
01514            write_data_float(hDB, hSet, "outputCurrent",  num, rdb.demandI);
01515      }
01516 
01517 #define STATUS_ON                           (1)
01518 #define STATUS_OutputFailureMaxCurrent (0x0020)
01519 #define STATUS_OutputCurrentLimited    (0x0400)
01520 #define STATUS_RAMPUP                  (0x0800)
01521 #define STATUS_RAMPDOWN                (0x1000)
01522 #define STATUS_ENABLEKILL              (0x2000)
01523 #define STATUS_15                      (0x8000)
01524 
01525   int xnum = set.numOutputs;
01526   if (xnum == 0)
01527      xnum = num;
01528 
01529   rdb.sparkCount.resize(xnum);
01530   rdb.sparkTime.resize(xnum);
01531 
01532   gOutputStatus.Resize(xnum);
01533   gSwitchStatus.Resize(xnum);
01534   gStatusStatus.Resize(xnum);
01535   gDemandStatus.Resize(xnum);
01536   gMeasuredStatus.Resize(xnum);
01537 
01538   for (int i=0; i<num; i++) {
01539      if ((rdb.status[i]&STATUS_ON) == 0)
01540         continue;
01541 
01542      if (rdb.status[i]&(STATUS_OutputCurrentLimited|STATUS_OutputFailureMaxCurrent)) {
01543 
01544         if (rdb.sparkTime[i] == 0) {
01545            rdb.sparkTime[i] = now;
01546            rdb.sparkCount[i] ++;
01547         }
01548 
01549         int age = time(NULL) - rdb.sparkTime[i];
01550 
01551         cm_msg(MINFO, frontend_name, "Spark on channel %d (HWCH %s), outputStatus 0x%x, spark count %d, spark age %d", i, rdb.names[i].c_str(), rdb.status[i], rdb.sparkCount[i], age);
01552 
01553         if (set.enableSparkMode) {
01554            if (age > set.sparkShutdownTime) {
01555               cm_msg(MERROR, frontend_name, "Turning off channel %d (HWCH %s), outputStatus 0x%x, spark count %d, spark age %d", i, rdb.names[i].c_str(), rdb.status[i], rdb.sparkCount[i], age);
01556               set_snmp_int("outputSwitch", rdb.indices[i], 0);
01557            } else
01558               set_snmp_int("outputSwitch", rdb.indices[i], 10);
01559 
01560            gNextRead = time(NULL) + 1;
01561         }
01562      } else {
01563         rdb.sparkTime[i] = 0;
01564      }
01565   }
01566 
01567   write_data_int(hDB, hVar, "switch",  num, rdb.switches);
01568   write_data_int(hDB, hVar, "status",  num, rdb.status);
01569   write_data_string(hDB, hRdb, "outputStatusString",  num, rdb.statusString, 100);
01570   write_data_float(hDB, hVar, "demandVoltage", num, rdb.demandV);
01571   write_data_float(hDB, hVar, "senseVoltage",  num, rdb.senseV);
01572   write_data_float(hDB, hVar, "current",       num, rdb.currents);
01573   write_data_int(hDB, hVar, "sparkCount",      num, rdb.sparkCount);
01574 
01575   if (rdb.sensorTemperature.size() > 0)
01576      write_data_int(hDB, hVar, "sensorTemperature", rdb.sensorTemperature.size(), rdb.sensorTemperature);
01577 
01578   if (rdb.fanSpeed.size() > 0)
01579      write_data_int(hDB, hVar, "fanSpeed", rdb.fanSpeed.size(), rdb.fanSpeed);
01580 
01581   open_hotlink(hDB, hSet);
01582 
01583   if (set.numOutputs != rdb.numOutputs) {
01584      update_settings();
01585      return 0;
01586   }
01587 
01588   static int prevSysMainSwitch = -1;
01589   if (prevSysMainSwitch != rdb.sysMainSwitch) {
01590      prevSysMainSwitch = rdb.sysMainSwitch;
01591      update_settings();
01592      return 0;
01593   }
01594 
01595   gMainStatus.Reset();
01596 
01597   gMainSwitchStatus.Reset();
01598   
01599   if (set.mainSwitch != rdb.sysMainSwitch)
01600      gMainSwitchStatus.Add(0, 100, kRed);
01601   else if (rdb.sysMainSwitch == 0)
01602      gMainSwitchStatus.Add(0, 10, kWhite);
01603   else if (rdb.sysMainSwitch == 1)
01604      gMainSwitchStatus.Add(0, 20, kGreen);
01605   else
01606      gMainSwitchStatus.Add(0, 100, kRed);
01607 
01608   gMainStatus.Add(0, gMainSwitchStatus, 0);
01609 
01610   gOutputStatus.Reset();
01611   gSwitchStatus.Reset();
01612   gStatusStatus.Reset();
01613   gDemandStatus.Reset();
01614   gMeasuredStatus.Reset();
01615 
01616   for (int i=0; i<num; i++) {
01617      if (set.resistance[i]) {
01618         double current = rdb.currents[i];
01619         if (current < 0)
01620            current = 0;
01621         double vcorr = set.resistance[i] * current;
01622         printf("chan %d, voltage %f / %f V, current %f A, resistance %f Ohm, correction %f V\n", i, set.odbDemand[i], set.demand[i], current, set.resistance[i], vcorr);
01623 
01624         set.demand[i] = set.odbDemand[i] + vcorr;
01625      }
01626      
01627      if (set.maxVoltage[i])
01628         if (set.demand[i] > set.maxVoltage[i])
01629            set.demand[i] = set.maxVoltage[i];
01630 
01631      if (rdb.sysMainSwitch > 0) {
01632         if (fabs(set.demand[i] - rdb.demandV[i]) > 0.100) {
01633            set_snmp_float("outputVoltage", rdb.indices[i], set.demand[i]);
01634            
01635            gDemandStatus.Add(i, 1000, kBlue);
01636            
01637            gNextRead = time(NULL);
01638            gFastRead = 10;
01639         }
01640      }
01641   }
01642 
01643   for (int i=0; i<num; i++) {
01644      if (rdb.switches[i] != set.outputSwitch[i])
01645         gSwitchStatus.Add(i, 100, kRed);
01646      else if (rdb.switches[i] == 0)
01647         gSwitchStatus.Add(i, 10, kWhite);
01648      else if (rdb.switches[i] == 1)
01649         gSwitchStatus.Add(i, 20, kGreen);
01650      else
01651         gSwitchStatus.Add(i, 100, kRed);
01652 
01653      if ((rdb.status[i]&~STATUS_ENABLEKILL&~STATUS_15) == 0)
01654         gStatusStatus.Add(i, 10, kWhite);
01655      else if ((rdb.status[i]&~STATUS_ENABLEKILL&~STATUS_15) == STATUS_ON)
01656         gStatusStatus.Add(i, 20, kGreen);
01657      else if ((rdb.status[i]&~STATUS_ENABLEKILL&~STATUS_ON&~STATUS_15) == STATUS_RAMPUP)
01658         gStatusStatus.Add(i, 40, kBlue);
01659      else if ((rdb.status[i]&~STATUS_ENABLEKILL&~STATUS_ON&~STATUS_15) == STATUS_RAMPDOWN)
01660         gStatusStatus.Add(i, 40, kBlue);
01661      else
01662         gStatusStatus.Add(i, 100, kRed);
01663 
01664      if ((rdb.status[i]&STATUS_ON) == 0)
01665         gDemandStatus.Add(i, 10, kWhite);
01666      else if (fabs(set.demand[i] - rdb.demandV[i]) < 1.0)
01667         gDemandStatus.Add(i, 20, kGreen);
01668      else
01669         gDemandStatus.Add(i, 30, kRed);
01670      
01671      if ((rdb.status[i]&STATUS_ON) == 0)
01672         gMeasuredStatus.Add(i, 10, kWhite);
01673      else if (fabs(set.demand[i] - rdb.senseV[i]) < 1.0)
01674         gMeasuredStatus.Add(i, 20, kGreen);
01675      else
01676         gMeasuredStatus.Add(i, 30, kYellow);
01677      
01678      gOutputStatus.Add(i, gSwitchStatus, i);
01679      gOutputStatus.Add(i, gStatusStatus, i);
01680      gOutputStatus.Add(i, gDemandStatus, i);
01681      gOutputStatus.Add(i, gMeasuredStatus, i);
01682 
01683      gMainStatus.Add(0, gOutputStatus, i);
01684   }
01685 
01686   gMainStatus.Write();
01687 
01688   if (1) {
01689      static time_t x = 0;
01690 
01691      bool update = false;
01692 
01693      if (gMainStatus.fStatus[0] <= gDelayedMainStatus.fStatus[0])
01694         update = true;
01695 
01696      if (gMainStatus.fStatus[0] > gDelayedMainStatus.fStatus[0]) {
01697         if (x == 0) {
01698            x = now + gMainStatusDelay;
01699         }
01700 
01701         if (now >= x)
01702            update = true;
01703 
01704         //printf("status %d -> %d, delay %d, update %d\n", gDelayedMainStatus.fStatus[0], gMainStatus.fStatus[0], x-now, update);
01705      }
01706 
01707      if (update) {
01708         gDelayedMainStatus.Reset();
01709         gDelayedMainStatus.Add(0, gMainStatus, 0);
01710         gDelayedMainStatus.Write();
01711         x = 0;
01712      }
01713   }
01714 
01715   gMainSwitchStatus.Write();
01716 
01717   gOutputStatus.Write();
01718   gSwitchStatus.Write();
01719   gStatusStatus.Write();
01720   gDemandStatus.Write();
01721   gMeasuredStatus.Write();
01722 
01723   return 0;
01724 }
01725 
01726 extern "C" INT poll_event(INT source, INT count, BOOL test)
01727 /* Polling routine for events. Returns TRUE if event
01728    is available. If test equals TRUE, don't return. The test
01729    flag is used to time the polling */
01730 {
01731   assert(!"poll_event is not implemented");
01732   return 0;
01733 }
